thread.title: Viral Marketing Internship - College Sports

title: Viral Marketing Internship - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Viral Marketing Internship Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: We have new sponsorships and promotions were introducing for 2015, some may have a chance to go viral if we create a unique marketing idea. Try to analyze things that have gone viral..   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
